attributes.title: Who made this??!
attributes.review: This has to be worst app ever created. Who even thought of making this terrible app. It’s so bad and poorly made. Don’t download this mess❤️

attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: I’m not about to keep this app because of the spamming and it crashes my phone and I keep getting kicked out of it

attributes.title: A concerned America.
attributes.review: Horrible app that I can’t even believe is allowed on the App Store. So much false news it’s ridiculous and needs to be banned from the App Store.

attributes.title: Absolute worst app in history
attributes.review: The app is about as bad as the current president, only it doesn’t have a mouth so it’s slightly better.

attributes.title: Trash ☺️✨
attributes.review: This is the worst app I had ever gotten it DOESNT even work it glitches way too much it makes my phone freeze and it makes me sick

attributes.title: UuUYyeEEYikes
attributes.review: Literal garbage. Doesn’t load, doesn’t work, and when it does it sends tons of spam and only requires a small loan of a million dollars to get it to stop.

attributes.title: Lame content
attributes.review: This app is garbage. If I could give it 0 I would. The Orange Menace is my favorite comic book villain, yet on this app all I read about is politics. Boring! I would really like to see a comeback of 44

attributes.title: Hurtful/Offensive Content
attributes.review: Trump is a horrible human being and doesn’t deserve to have an app. He doesn’t deserve to 1 be president, but also to have done horrible things.

attributes.title: No oranges🤫
attributes.review: This app has no point I’ve been frustrated ever since I downloaded i would not recommend it to anyone

attributes.title: Doesn’t work at all
attributes.review: The app doesn’t convey any news that’s important and it doesn’t work at all it keeps glitching
